title: Ethical Hacking; Basic Concepts of Networking
headline: Learn about the basic concepts of networking in this free online course.
description: This free online Ethical Hacking basic concepts of networking course can be of great help to learners who are willing to learn the basics of networking and ethical hacking. This course gives you information regarding the basic concepts of networking and introduces you to ethical hacking, IP addressing and routing. By the end of the course, you will be ready to face the challenging world of ethical hacking as an eager learner.

courseDescription:
This course will begin by introducing you to ethical hacking. You will learn about the differences between penetration testing and ethical hacking. You will learn about the roles of an ethical hacker and terminologies used in ethical hacking. You will also learn the different ways through which an ethical hacker can gain access to a system.

The course then explains the different types of computer networks, the difference between circuit switching and packet switching mode of data transfer. You will learn about datagrams and layered network architecture. Next, you will learn about the TCP/IP stack along with the basic functions of TCP, UDP and IP. You will also learn about IP Datagrams and IP Header fields.

Finally, you will learn about IP addressing and routing. You will learn about IP packet fragmentation and the types of fragmentation. You will also learn the roles of TCP, UDP and IP subnetting in the context of networking. You will learn about IP subnetworks, also called subnets and gain significant knowledge on IP masks, how they are used along with methods of creating subnetworks - VLSM and CIDR. Start this course today, and learn insightful skills in networking and ethical hacking.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
